post.body: Same w/ K. Must be AL weather. Jan = "Spring" cleaning?
I like sudoku (free), tapdefense, cube runner. Always looking for a good distraction though.
cleaned while I took the kids on errands and when they went to bed. Can now enjoy a clean house - thx, my amazing wife.
Which service are you using? We used Vonage until we moved and went to cells exclusively.
Are you rephrasing the same idea or would you argue for a form of annihilation? Neither?
Michael thinks that if professors are going to assign reading for the 1st day then they should post it AT LEAST 1 wk ahead. Suppose they'..
Going to iron and watch MadMen season one
Our pastor @ RedMtn got a G1 since he's tied to TMobile. Anyone know of a good twitter app for Android? Trying to convince him to join.
Disappointed that #cpscia may prevent some of the best, hand-crafted toys from being sold. Write your congressman 4 reform of #cpscia. #tcot
Just picked up dinner from New Chinatown in 5points. Great Chinese food on the cheap!
RT @biz: Twitter Eng and Ops are on it now but be careful of DMs with a blogspot link that redirect to what seems like twitter.com
#BAM unlike #B&N will accept returns without receipt for store credit. FYI
Terrible policy at #B&N. Hope their sales plummet. So much for customer service. Never coming back.
If you bought gifts at #B&N, hope you gave a gift receipt. No returns without. For Jan. only, can exchange for equal or greater value.
Silly daddy. Forgot book to return. Need to return home. :(
Two libraries, then B&N.
I wish twitterfon gave me the option of seeing name instead of twitted id on updates. Also want to see my favs.
I do now. Thanks!
Who would have thought: our mail wasn't been held by local post office, but regional distro ctr.
Headed to the post office to pick up all our mail.
